location: Kamchia Longoz Reserve, Northern Black Sea Coast, Bulgaria

details.notes: This is the typical price for a short motorboat trip exploring the Longoz (flooded) forest section of the river. Often includes narration by the captain.
Prices as low as 16 BGN are sometimes available for adults/children over 12, especially when booked online or through specific promotions.
Children typically receive a 50% discount on the standard adult fare.
Price for a one-hour rental for independent river exploration.
This price is for the entire boat for a small group (often up to 4-5 people) for a more intimate experience.

This is a specialized, longer excursion price that usually includes kayak rental, a guide, instruction, and often round-trip transportation from Varna/nearby resorts (Free Cancellation usually applies).

booking_tips: Booking online in advance is generally recommended, especially during the peak season (July-August), as it can secure a slightly lower rate and ensure availability.
Cash (BGN) is preferred by many smaller vendors at the river mouth and beach area.
Prices are subject to change and may be slightly higher or lower depending on the specific vendor (e.g., 'Lucy & Longoz Boat Trips').
